location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Inventory and Account of Sales of the Effects of John Paul Schedel, deceased, who died at Schiras (Shiraz) in 1776, and sold in Bushire 14 July 1777 from John Beaumont and George Green at Bushire

physicalDescription.extent: The item is damaged and has several holes in its text.

mods.abstract: List of John Paul Schedel's belongings that were sold including details of who purchased them and how much for.
